statement.p: Consider the note A3 which has frequency 220 Hz.
What is the period for A3?
What is the wavelength for A3?
Recall that the speed of sound is 1116 feet per second.

solution.p: Period is the inverse of frequency, so \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{220}}\approx{0.0045454545454545}\approx{0.00454545}.
Wavelength is a unit conversion: \displaystyle\frac{{{1116}\ \text{ ft}}}{{\text{second}}}\cdot\frac{{{1}\ \text{ second}}}{{{220}\ \text{ cycles}}}\approx{5.0727272727273}\approx{5.073}.
